rev.desc.rev.desc: added the following condition to the start panel 'index("\\", $L.temp)=0' to the expression 'while (index("scmsg(", $L.temp)>0)' to avoid evaluating expressions where scmsg is just used as a string.
devtx I1733: updated the first for statement on the start panel.

I trapped for any cases where the number being passed into the scmsg function was a variable. These messages are trapped for and not included in the the sql statement since they don't make sense in this context.
